alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Pulaski; Sumter; Twiggs; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:53AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dodge, Pulaski, south central Twiggs, northwestern Wilcox, Dooly, Bleckley, southeastern Houston, southeastern Sumter and Crisp Counties through 815 AM EST... At 752 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Kathleen to near Leslie, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Cochran, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Unadilla, Arabi, Byromville, Pineview, Pinehurst, Leslie, Lilly, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Lamar, Hayneville, Mobley Crossing, Mock Springs, Seville and Finleyson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Crisp; Dodge; Dooly; Houston; Pulaski; Sumter; Twiggs; Wilcox
